channel.title: I need help with Pvp Command

item.title: I need help with Pvp Command
item.dc:creator: @software software
item.description:
@software wrote:

o god. Only the message sending doesn’t turn the mode on you must have the variable for the code like public int pvpmode = 0;

So, add the int and like code the int to your combat like

if(pvpmode = 0) { resetAttack(); sM("blahblah"); )

And make the int change to 1 when u want to turn it on with that command

Make sure u code that other with pvp on cant attack you and also make sure to add every your attack code when they got like isinwild or some replace that with pvpmode = 1

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Pvp Command

item.title: I need help with Pvp Command
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

Can someone please help me get started with making a ::on and ::off
This is pretty much everything but the wild level itself. Thats all I need to know is how to make you in lvl 20 wild when you type ::on and make you lvl (-1 or 0 not sure how that works) when you type ::off
if(command.startsWith(“On”) && playerRights >= 0){
sM(“You have turned pvp on”);
}
if(command.startsWith(“Off”) && playerRights >= 0){
sM(“You have turned pvp off”);
if(Player is fighting. I don’t know what to put here{
sM(“You cannot turn pvp off during combat”);
}

Ive never done anything involving Pvp so im not even sure where to start.
Anyhelp?

Read full topic
